channel.title: DeadlyPvP ~ 317 ~ Need Staff and Players

item.title: DeadlyPvP ~ 317 ~ Need Staff and Players
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

[quote=“1 2 3 4 KOED, post:8, topic:518332”]Please don’t list
-Working Dungeoneering (dungeoneering sucks you can’t even end the dungeon)

  • 100% Duel Arena (cheat engine dupe works)
  • 100% Pest Control (the monsters aren’t added to PC you just attack the portals)
  • 100% Warrior Guild (you can’t pick up your armor after killing the animated figure)
  • Perfect Summoning (none of the monster specials/scrolls work)
  • Perfect Combat System (Not even close to perfect it needs a 100% over haul)
  • DDoS Server Protection (not even the top RSPS have full server DDoS protection it’s like 3k a month)
  • No Lag At All (Server extremely laggy due to how many custom interfaces it has.)

Those are just the basics…[/quote]
And can you code this?

Read full topic

item.title: DeadlyPvP ~ 317 ~ Need Staff and Players
item.dc:creator: @CrzyLexii CrzyLexii
item.description:
@CrzyLexii wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:9, topic:518332”][quote author=CrzyLexii link=topic=636594.msg4293125#msg4293125 date=1367699493]

Never heard of “deathlypvpz” but thanks for your concern.

Wow never heard of it but using their source your a dumbass-.-

At least I can spell you’re*. Source was found on rswebclients. Not my fault Never heard of something with a name like ours.
[/quote]
But it is your fault for completely leeching it.[/quote]

If you play it, you play it, if you don’t, you don’t. No need to harass me about something like this. It is a server. On Rswebclients, where you use a source anyway. Yes, it is the source you described. Yes some things may be leeched, there are things we added, there are things we took out. Stop harassing me about something so stupid. Please and thanks.

Koed, Scrolls work, pest control adding monsters now, Dungeoneering does work (you have to be smarter than the game), cheat engine dupe fixed, warrior guild yes you can. Next time you rant about something, try playing it first.

Read full topic
